programme.title: Heart Xmas Late
programme.desc: As night falls, a day ends, and we are one step closer to Christmas Day. Let Heart Xmas help you unwind and fall asleep, and dream of... Christmas.

programme.title: Heart Xmas All-Night
programme.desc: Christmas doesn't sleep, and neither does Heart Xmas! Get ready to hear all your favourite songs as we Turn Up the Festive Feel Good all the way until 6am!

programme.title: Heart Xmas Festive Feel Good
programme.desc: Do you wish it could be Christmas every day? So do we! Here at Heart Xmas, we've got all the Festive Feel Good tunes to get you into the Christmas spirit...

programme.title: Non-stop Heart Xmas
programme.desc: Love Christmas? Then yule love Heart Xmas! We'll be bringing you non-stop Festive Feel Good - no presenters, no ads... just Christmas songs!
